caption.title: The relative impact of including a particular neighborhood in the intervention response (mean prevalence of simulations in which a particular neighborhood was included divided by the mean prevalence over all simulations) in relation to the population size of that neighborhood, based on the individual response scenario.
caption.p:
R
2 values are 0.67, 0.56, and 0.11 for San Juan, Recife and Jakarta, respectively.
